title: Benjamin Netanyahu Claims Next Phase Of Gaza Ceasefire Is Close Despite Air Strikes | 10 News
description: Despite ongoing air strikes and the death toll climbing, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has praised the U.S.-backed ceasefire in Gaza and claims it's close to entering its second phase. Once the last hostage is found and returned, the next stage of the agreement will theoretically become available, but it includes conditions Hamas has so far refused to abide by. title: Firefighter Killed In NSW Bushfires While Trying To Protect At-Risk Community | 10 News
description: The dangers of bushfire season have been brought into sharp focus with the death of a 59-year-old firefighter, sending shockwaves through the emergency services community. The highly experienced National Parks worker is being remembered as a hero for trying to protect an at-risk community on the NSW Mid-North Coast. title: Barnaby Joyce & Pauline Hanson Explain Vision For One Nation's Future | 10 News+
description: Former deputy prime minister and Nationals MP Barnaby Joyce has confirmed he is joining Pauline Hanson’s One Nation. The pair announced the news on Tamworth’s local community radio, in Joyce’s electorate of New England, in New South Wales. The party switch comes after Joyce quit the Nationals a week and a half ago. title: Oscar Piastri Falls Short, Next Phase Of Gaza Peace Plan, Oprah Crashes Fan's Birthday | 10 News+
description: Former deputy prime minister and Nationals MP Barnaby Joyce has confirmed he is joining Pauline Hanson’s One Nation. The pair announced the news on Tamworth’s local community radio, in Joyce’s electorate of New England, in New South Wales. The party switch comes after Joyce quit the Nationals a week and a half ago.  ALDU has failed to phase out cage eggs in their stores by the end of 2025, which was the promised deadline the supermarket giant gave a decade ago. Angelina Popovski, who was just 14 years old in 2015, started the successful petition calling for ALDI to transition entirely to cage-free eggs. An ALDI spokesperson now claims the company will “complete the transition to 100% cage-free shell eggs by 2030”.  Oprah Winfrey has surprised a fan by crashing her birthday party. Clarissa Hill was celebrating turning 80, when the American talk show icon walked in with her wedding cake. The Brisbane woman joined 10 News+ to talk about her reaction to the special moment. title: ALDI Fails To Phase Out Cage Eggs By Promised 2025 Deadline | 10 News+
description: ALDI has failed to phase out cage eggs in their stores by the end of 2025, which was the promised deadline the supermarket giant gave a decade ago. Angelina Popovski, who was just 14 years old in 2015, started the successful petition calling for ALDI to transition entirely to cage-free eggs. An ALDI spokesperson now claims the company will “complete the transition to 100% cage-free shell eggs by 2030”. title: Rajwinder Singh Found Guilty Of Murdering 24-Year-Old Toyah Cordingly In Queensland | 10 News
description: After seven years of anguish for a grieving family, a four year international manhunt and 7 hours of deliberation, a jury has found Rajwinder Singh guilty of murdering 24-year-old Toyah Cordingly on a secluded, Far North Queensland beach.
